title: Cloak of Flash
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|A vibrating cloak.}} [[File:Cloak_of_flash.png]] '''''the +3 cloak of Flash''''' +3 [[cloak]] +4 EV
+Fly ==Desirability== The '''cloak of Flash''' offers a lot of raw defense, and having a source of flight is always nice. ==History== This cloak was removed in [[0.17]]. [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Cloaks]]
